jwt.key: add some random generated string here min 32length

app.secret: add some random generated string here min 32length

steam_api_key: Your Steam API Key Here (Leave Empty to disable steam login)

paypal.paypal_client_id: Your paypal client id here (Leave Empty to disable Paypal Feature)

payU.enabled: write true to enable payu and false to disable payu, make sure to write true or false without double codes as it is boolean value
payU.environment: write test to run payu in test environment, live to make payu work with live payments
payU.merchantKey: your payu merchant key (test key for test, live key for live)
payU.merchantSalt: your payu merchant salt (test salt for test, live salt for live)

razorPay.enabled: write true to enable razorPay and false to disable razorPay, make sure to write true or false without double codes as it is boolean value
razorPay.environment: write test to run razorPay in test environment, live to make razorPay work with live payments
razorPay.keyId: your razorPay key_id (test key for test, live key for live)
razorPay.keySecret: your razorPay key_secret (test key_secret for test, live key_secret for live)
